SELECT i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, temp.price_discount as price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id, MIN(price_discount) as price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) temp ON i.id = temp.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name like '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'
ORDER BY
i.sell_counts DESC
temp.price_discount ASC
i.item_name ASC
